item.headline: Welcome to a Refreshed Aplia
item.description: Watch a quick overview of the refreshed Aplia platform. This refreshed look and feel will help you to easily and quickly focus on what is important, while maintaining the same functionality that you know and love. Visit our website at www.cengage.com/aplia.
